title: AirPods 2 - What's the Difference?
description: AirPods 2 with a new Wireless charging case is here. They look pretty much identical to AirPods 1 but what's the difference? Subscribe for my AirPods 2 vs Galaxy Buds Review + Comparison! Secret Galaxy S10 Wallpapers!   the 2019 AirPods feature wireless charging, a new H1 chip that enables hey Siri through voice, 50% more talk time and faster switching between devices.  Wireless Chargers!    Tech that made my iPhone better:  The Perfect MacBook Pro Setup:   TLD Spotify Playlist!   TLD Behind the Scenes!  Mobile users:   Music via Musicbed:   My Audio Setup & Gear:

You might be thinking, "Those look a lot like the AirPods that I already spend a hell of a lot of money on, what is the difference?", and today I am going to break that down.
